none, keep it that way


This game is OVA

Rules
Spoiler: Moderator:
-I, TheTrollie, am your moderator! I will handle any situations as I see fit.
-Message me with any concerns you have regarding game mechanics, even something as simple as a vote count. The more that can be worked out behind the scenes, the better for everyone!
-Any time you want my attention in-thread, please use bold.
-If rules are broken I have the right to judge if replacement or modkill is needed.
-I may change the rules at any point in the game, although you will be notified.
-Flavour is for the purpose of entertainment only and will not be any indication of role or alignment.

Spoiler: General:
1) Have fun! And allow others to have fun too. Excessive insults or personal attacks will result in a warning or force-replacement.
2) There must be no talking about the game outside this thread, unless using a method allowed by your Role PM.
3) No editing of posts. Ever.
4) No quoting of any PMs or QTs relating to the game.
5) Orange is my colour. Don’t use it.
6) Do not discuss ongoing games.
6.5) Do not post any small, invisible, or cryptic text. All text must be seen and coherent by the naked eye and all players in the game. All game relevant info must be included in the body of a post itself, this means no using your signature for game-related information.
7) Hydras are allowed, but no more than two heads, and they must be PM’d to me.
8) I'm new to modding, pls help me along by PMing me if you see any errors. I'll do my best to make this a well-run game.

Spoiler: Gameplay:
9) Votes must be bolded or in vote tag format to count. I will not count any that are not. Example: Vote: TheTrollie Abbreviations can also be used as long as it’s clear who you’re voting for. Example: Vote: TT
10) Unvoting when changing a vote is helpful, but not required. Voting at the beginning of a line is also helpful, but not required.
11) A no-lynch before deadline requires at least half of votes. A lynch always requires a majority of votes.
12) Once a majority is reached, it becomes twilight until I can post the lynch. No voting or unvoting will count.
13) No majority at deadline means no lynch occurs.

Spoiler: Activity:
14) Please inform me if and when you will be V/LA. If I feel the period is too long or there is some other reason for me to do so, I will replace you.
15) Prods will be sent after 2 days (48 hours) without a post. If there is no response after another 24 hours, you will be replaced.
16) If someone accumulates 2 prods over the course of the game and I feel they are not active enough, they will be replaced.
17) Days last 2 weeks unless a lynch occurs before deadline or an extension is granted. Feel free to ask for them, but I will only grant one if it’s deserved.
18) Nights will last 48 hours.

Sample Vanilla Townie Role PM

Welcome [player], you are a Vanilla Townie.

You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated.

During the day you have the ability to post in the game thread and vote.

Please confirm by sending your role to me by PM.


Creds to DeasVail since I used mostly MattP's ruleset which was stolen from him.

Here is what this post said originally, I have since decided to use this for my really awesome play-by-play:

Role PM's have been sent out.

UPDATE: 11/13 have confirmed. if the others do not confirm within (expired on 2013-06-02 18:28:32) I will seek replacements

BEEP…BEEP….BEEP. Ugh, Trollie's alarm goes off, time to get up and smell the roses big boy! Trollie starts speaking to his stuffed animals. "Last night was totally AWESOME!" he says, "I got home from work, watched some TV, and cozied up in bed. What a rad night, and today promises to be as unbelievably awesome as yesterday!" Trollie gets dressed and walks down stairs so he can get breakfast. But something doesn't feel right...so he walks into his living room to find that, in the midst of all the awesome stuff that happened last night, thatguy's dead body has wound up on his coffee table. "who the fuck are all of these people in my living room?" trollie exclaims. It seems that the local circus-parade-robo-wonder show crew got derailed from their circus-parade-robo-wonder route, and were now lost in Trollie's living room. All 13 of them:

mrbungle - The big blower boy
rmpeacoc - world jax champion
Infinity 324 - professional lullaby singer
xRECKONERx - hover craft macaroni and cheese specialist
Telo - junk-hugger
Diggity - quiltmaker ladybug
Mechron - the human punchcard
quadz08 - Roy "really good at walking" Rogers
Antagon - the man of 1000 coat hangers
roflcopter - Beach Shell Listener
Mirari - Lassy Look-alike
CommieX - Ferbee Trainer
Bud Bidderskins - what's-his-face

"Get Out!" Trollie says, but then he remembers the dead body of thatguy. "Did one of you do this?" Trollie asked, but none of the circus-parade-robo-wonder members answered. Trollie gets out his Gorilla Glue and glues the dead body to the ceiling so that it is out of everybody's way.

Then he locks all the doors and glues them up too.

"none of you are leaving until we find out who did this," Trollie says, "I am going back up to my room, and by the time I come back down you better have this all sorted out." Trollie goes upstairs and slams the door shut in outrage. What are the circus-parade-robo-wonder show people supposed to do? They better act fast, I'm not sure how long that Gorilla Glue is gonna hold thatguy's body!
